ygData.subject: Re: does Bard need charisma?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Silver Cat s Eye Amulet is only +3 CHA, and can easily be made by most jewelers. ... The Silk Evening Tunic can be found in Qeynos. I can t remember the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello friends:


>Bob - nm on the pvt note - I read your response on the shirts and see you
>have cats eye amulet - better stat than cha +5?


Silver Cat's Eye Amulet is only +3 CHA, and can easily be made by most
jewelers.


>I have heard that you can buy a silk shirt and I sure would like one! Can
>anyone tell me where?


The Silk Evening Tunic can be found in Qeynos. I can't remember the name of
the merchant, but it is a woman, and she's just outside the Lion's Mane
Inn, under a tent, near a couple of other merchants. The tunic looks just
like a cloth tunic in her booth, so be sure to look carefully at them.





-- Jythri duan Cliar
Pencerdd of The Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com
